skills.name: Dragon's Might
skills.description: Inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns if you land a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: The damage of this attack increases as your HP drops. If your HP is below 30%, the enemy's Defense is ignored.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Ignore DEF
skill_effect.description: Attack will ignore the target's defense.

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-2.0*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's current HP % in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Current HP %</mark> + 7.5)

skills.name: Tooth For a Tooth (Passive)
skills.description: Increases the Attack Bar of all allies by 20% if an ally receives a Critical Hit. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.
